Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def.policy.IAePolicy

Packages that use IAePolicy
org.activebpel.rt.bpel This package contains classes for creating a BPEL model and for implements a standalone BPEL engine for testing designs. 
org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def Classes that represent WSDL elements (partner links, port types, properties, and the like) and that serialize and deserialize them.  
org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def.policy   
 

Uses of IAePolicy in org.activebpel.rt.bpel
 

Methods in org.activebpel.rt.bpel that return IAePolicy
static IAePolicy AeWSDLPolicyHelper.getPolicy(AeBPELExtendedWSDLDef aDef, IAePolicyReference aPolicyRef)
          Resolves and returns the IAePolicy element at the location specified in the URI attribute of a wsp:PolicyReference For example, the namespace URI of "http://www.fabrikam123.com/policies#RmPolicy" is "http://www.fabrikam123.com/policies" and the wsu:Id is "RmPolicy" If there's a null or empty namespace on the URI we'll just do the lookup using the id
static IAePolicy AeWSDLPolicyHelper.getPolicy(IAeContextWSDLProvider aProvider, IAePolicyReference aPolicyRef)
          Resolves and returns the IAePolicy element at the location specified in the URI attribute of a wsp:PolicyReference For example, the namespace URI of "http://www.fabrikam123.com/policies#RmPolicy" is "http://www.fabrikam123.com/policies" and the wsu:Id is "RmPolicy" If there's a null or empty namespace on the URI we'll just do the lookup using the id
 

Uses of IAePolicy in org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def
 

Methods in org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def that return IAePolicy
 IAePolicy AeBPELExtendedWSDLDef.createPolicy(java.lang.String aBpelNamespace, java.lang.String aNamespace, java.lang.String aId)
          Creates a new Policy extension element adding it to the WSDL definition.
 IAePolicy AeBPELExtendedWSDLDef.getPolicy(java.lang.String aId)
          Retreive a policy extension implementation by wsu:Id.
 IAePolicy AeBPELExtendedWSDLDef.getPolicy(java.lang.String aNamespace, java.lang.String aId)
          Retreive a policy extension implementation by relative URI and optional namespace.
 

Methods in org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def with parameters of type IAePolicy

          Removes a Policy extension implementation by object instance
